title: Ticket #4076: lib_eventlog_base can't be run repeatedly
description:
lib_eventlog_base can't be run repeatedly. It refuses to run if it's work directory (test-eventlog_base) already exists, and doesn't (by default) clear out that directory on completion.

Changing so that it always wipes that directory on startup.
check_ins: 2013-Nov-18 14:08   Check-in [38744]: lib_eventlog_base can now run repeatedly #4076 It now cleans up old runs before starting, instead of refusing to run. (By Alan De Smet )
